ygData.subject: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I was just sitting here wondering about our missing songs, as I am coming up to level 39 and have nothing to look forward to I thought about creating this post
ygData.messageBody:
I was just sitting here wondering about our missing songs, as I am coming
up to level 39 and have nothing to look forward to I thought about creating
this post to see what you all thought.

What I thought would be a good idea is if we all came up with suggestions
for songs and chose the best ones (via a vote). We could then post these
suggestions on the EQ forum notice boards and prehaps Verant will consider
these as ideas for our missing songs (or for the update). I think if it was
a formal post that has come from this list it may be taken seriously. The
post would not be a rant just a suggestion.

My suggestion for songs would be:

Level 39: Invis to Undead (useful in Lower guk etc)
Level 45: An upgraded Bellow/DD song (giving us better combat skills)
Level 47: Summon Corpse song (like the necro one)
Level 49: Upgraded older song (such as charm) or a combo song (2 effects
such as hymm and clarity)

Just a few suggestions, I would like to hear everyone suggestions and
prehaps the best ones could be posted on EQ boards to get Verant moving.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 38 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server
